thread.title: Amal Clooney’s baby bump upstages George | Page Six
thread.title_full: Amal Clooney’s baby bump upstages George | Page Six

author: Christine Burroni
title: Amal Clooney’s baby bump upstages George | Page Six
text:
George and Amal Clooney Getty Images Amal Clooney has finally decided to show off her baby bump.
Photographed at Paris’ César Film Awards alongside husband George Clooney, the 39-year-old wore a form-fitting white gown that didn’t hide her growing belly.
News that the couple is expecting twins was confirmed by “The Talk” host Julie Chen on Feb. 9, putting an end to pregnancy rumors that were sparked by Amal’s choices of loose-fitting clothing in previous appearances.
Thankfully, she ditched the baggy garb with her latest red-carpet look — a chic white strapless number with feathers on the bottom — which is just the beginning of the the fashionista’s pregnancy style.
Even though the couple — who wed in September 2014 — attended the ceremony for George, 51, to receive the prestigious Honorary César Award, Amal and her bump stole the spotlight.
